reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater to be of good quality and appreciate its perfect size. They like its design, with one customer noting it's exactly as pictured, and another mentioning the material isn't itchy or too hot. While some it fits perfectly, others report that the sizing is off.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome for Christmas
items.body: I was hopeful the fabric would feel like an actual knit sweater and it definitely is. Came quickly and the colors are great. Seems to be decent quality, definitely excited to wear this for Xmas. I am 5'5" and 140 lbs and it fits me perfectly without being too snug Read more
items.author: Alexi Price

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars You actually get what you pay for! ðŸ˜
items.body: Okay. So I don't normally write reviews, but I had to write a review for this one because I think this person deserves so much more credit on the product itself. I was amazed when I received it. At first I was very skeptical because there weren't that many reviews and stuff. And it just seems very stock photo, at least to me, and I mean buying stuff online, you kind of have to be skeptical in what you buy. But this product amazed me it's legitimately knitted, like the comments said and came exactly like I saw. I had to read the reviews before I bought, and make sure this isn't some copy photo from another site. And it's all great quality. My husband's actually jealous of my ugly sweater compared to his ugly sweater, because his ugly sweater is like that costume, material type and mine's actually like a knitted sweater like i'm just amazed. And I honestly think that this person deserves way more credit on everything. So definitely take my word for it. Buy this product from this person. It's legitimately a good sweater. It's not some costume, photo material or a scam to you, it's a great product. I have to a 100% say definitely, will purchase from this person again, if they have other clothes or other stuff from them because this is just great. Read more
items.author: Danielle Nguyen

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great design, SUPER tiny.
items.body: This sweater fits weird and has no give. The design is PERFECT, but I'd suggest going up at least two sizes. The quality of the sweater is nice-but the fit is sooooooo off that I ended up giving the XXL to my 12 year old daughter to wear!!! Read more
items.author: Ola Beavz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect!
items.body: I was a little sketched out about buying this because it only had one review but I LOVE it! ðŸ˜ and itâ€™s actually knittedâ€”I was scared it would be just printed. Size is perfect. I wanted it to be a little baggy but not too much, and the medium was perfect. Read more
items.author: anabelle

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ugly sweater!
items.body: My wife love it! Read more
items.author: Drip10

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy!
items.body: Very nice, good quality sweater! True to size. Read more
items.author: Terie Simpson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable and affordable ugly Christmas sweater!
items.body: This ugly Christmas sweater surpassed all my expectations! It arrived quickly (~2-3 days) during the week before Christmas. It's high quality, comfortable, and exactly as pictured. Can't wait to wear it again next year! Read more
items.author: MP

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome
items.body: Perfect size and nice quality. Read more
items.author: Sandra

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Cute Cookie, Reindeer Red, Black Christmas Tree, Light Dinosaur, Christmas Tree Striped, Snowman Striped, Santa Sleigh Black, Santa Sleigh Red, Santa Striped, Pink Xmas. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
